participant_1.name: Liam
participant_1.personality: thoughtful and introspective, enjoys deep conversations about life and spirituality.
participant_1.background: i live in alaska. i'm a buddhist. i quit my job to pursue my spirituality full time. i like meditation.

participant_2.name: Sophie
participant_2.personality: friendly and ambitious, loves helping others and is a bit of a night owl.
participant_2.background: i don't like chicken. i recently got an apartment with my best friend. i am in college to become a nurse. i work at a bar at night to pay for college.

content.text: Hi how are you today what kind of music do you like?
